ocrd-nmalign-merge.description: forced alignment of lists of string by fuzzy string matching

normalization.description: replacement pairs (regex patterns and regex backrefs) to be applied prior to matching (but not on the result itself)

allow_splits.description: allow line strings of the first input fileGrp to be matched by multiple line strings of the second input fileGrp (so concatenate all the latter before inserting into the former)
